lines.text:
[after mumbling to himself]
Ah! Oh, boy!
Give me that book. "Post War Inventions"! Put out that light and get to bed.
It's colossal! It's stupendous! As a matter of fact, it's big.

[off-screen]
Do you like bright, sparkling teeth? If you do, send us your teeth and we will clean them for you.

[off-screen]
Pow! What a right to the jaw.
